title: (x) Looking for a Gill Sans alternative for use on both Mac and PC {gang}
content: Does anyone know of a font that is similar to Gill Sans that can be used on both a PC and Mac?
author: bessd1

comments.content: By "can be used" do you mean _comes pre-installed_ on both OS X and Windows?
That would be the best senario, but if it's a purchased font, it's ok too.

Gill can be used on both systems, but other, and in my humble opinion better alternatives would be [P22 Underground Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071706/http:/www.p22.com/products/underground.html) or [ITC Johnston](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/johnston/).

I guess the closest, commonly installed, face would be Century Gothic?
Nearly any font is available on both platforms. Have a look at my list of [Gill Sans alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071706/http:/typographica.org/001084.php).
